title: Early Access
content:
Dungeons & Dragons ruleset. CEO Swen Vincke explained that some rules and systems don't translate well directly from tabletop to digital game, so Larian has worked to create an interpretation of 5th Edition rules that works well as a digital game but still feels true to D&D.

Will there be Companions or allies who are not Origin characters?

Yes, you will be able to recruit mercenaries.

Will Feats be included?

Yes, but not immediately in Early Access though.
